basics.name: Mike Collier
basics.label: Enterprise AI Strategist · Product Management Coach
basics.summary: Hands-on product leader, Enterprise Team Coach, and Enterprise AI strategist with 12 years in federal government contracting, guiding digital-service teams at CMS, VA, CDC, and CEQ. As an extreme generalist I thrive where agile software development, lean thinking, and modern AI converge, bridging technology, business strategy, and human-centered design to transform bold ideas into usable products. I coach product managers, delivery leads, UX designers, and engineers on effective utilization of AI to support delivery and responsible AI practices, accelerating discovery-to-delivery flow, supporting the delivery of accessible and high value human-centered solutions. I enjoy and thrive in direct project delivery, coaching, and consulting in fast paced, agile environments.

work.name: Agile Six Applications, Inc.
work.summary: Promoted to shape company-wide AI vision, drive ethical Gen-AI adoption, and coach product teams on LLM-enabled delivery.
highlights: Launched an Innovation Lab & AI Community of Practice; supported the advancement of Gen-AI enterprise capabilities.
Built multiple internal generative AI applications to support delivery, proposals, and client demonstrations.
